title: Ethereum 2.0 Final Upgrade Complete – Network Processes 100,000 Transactions Per Second
shortdescription: The Merge Part 2 brings instant finality and zero gas fees as ETH price surges 40% overnight.
description: Network now processes 100K TPS with near-zero fees — ETH price jumps 40% as scalability breakthrough completes.
author: Emma Chen

title: Tether Launches $1 Billion Bitcoin Mining Operation – Largest Corporate Mining Venture Ever
shortdescription: USDT issuer enters mining with massive investment across Paraguay, El Salvador, and Texas facilities.
description: Tether deploys 100,000 ASIC miners using 100% renewable energy — expects 10 EH/s hashrate by Q3 2026.
author: Emma Chen

title: Bitcoin Lightning Network Hits 1 Million Nodes – Payment Rails Now Rival Visa
shortdescription: Layer 2 solution processes 500,000 transactions per second as global adoption explodes.
description: Lightning Network capacity grows to 25,000 BTC ($2.5B) — McDonald's, Starbucks, Walmart now accept Lightning payments.
author: Emma Chen

title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Reaches $100 Billion AUM – Largest ETF Launch in History
shortdescription: IBIT shatters all records as institutional adoption accelerates beyond expectations.
description: iShares Bitcoin Trust holds 4.5% of all Bitcoin ever mined — combined spot ETF market surpasses gold ETFs.
author: Emma Chen
